testcase.classname: Look for mobile phones on amazon
testcase.name: To get a list of samsung phones on amazon based on the search criteria - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the amazon all menu......................................passed And User chooses "Electronics & Computers" to shop by department............passed And User chooses "Phones & Accessories" from electronics....................passed And User goes to mobiles section to choose "SIM-Free" phones in the menu....passed When the user sets the search criteria with the brand "Samsung", the camResolution "20 MP & above", the modelYear "2023" and the priceRange "£50-£100".passed Then the user should see the results based on their search..................passed
